availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Elizabeth Hayden. Father of Nancy Hayden, James Hayden, Elizabeth Hayden, John Hayden, Lorinda Hayden, Levi Hayden, Catherine Sarah Hayden, and Mary Hayden. Farmer in Henry County in 1850 and 1860.

ab.bibl: Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, District 1, p. 386. Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Subdivision 2, p. 225. Find A Grave, "Elizabeth Hayden (1807-1869)," Memorial #28420872, http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=28420872 (accessed September 22, 2017).
